comment.body:
Hey that's very interesting here!

I have to admit, I switched back to jpg again. I found out that there is actually a kind of long-term conflict between google and firefox over .webp. So it will take a while until they will have implemented them.

But there is also .flif (free lossless image format). It's even better than webp. But it is still in development. There is however a similar tool (aka javascript converter) like webpjs for it.

Maybe we could ask some professionals in the forums if they know how to include the scripts?
There is a .js file in the blog-page folder. Maybe if the script would be included in there it could work?
